attributes.action: Introduce a tax on plastic carrier bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A tax of, say 10p, should be levied on all plastic carrier bags, which will encourage their re-use, rather than being thrown away, or encourage people to buy long-lasting canvas bags. This will raise revenue for the Exchequer and be good for the environment.
